CEO title at Google to cofounder Larry Page NEW YORK( CNNMoney)-- Google CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his role as Google's CEO in April and be replaced by co-founder Larry Page. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a prepared statement.
